title: MLB.TV Button (Scoreboard)
custom_preconds:
Given a user is logged in with a FYT account (following Team A)
and Team B is in-market
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Scoreboard
and taps on the Game Detail popover
and then taps on the MLB.TV button for that game (Team A vs Team B)

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed for Team A plays
Then the feed for Team A plays

title: MLB.TV Button (Team Page)
custom_preconds:
Given a user is logged in with a FYT account (following Team A)
and Team B is in-market
custom_steps:
When a user is on a Team Page
and taps on the MLB.TV button for that game (Team A vs Team B)

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed for Team A plays
Then the feed for Team A plays

title: MLB.TV EPG
custom_preconds:
Given a user is logged in with a FYT account (following Team A)
and Team B is in-market
custom_steps:
When a user is on the MLB.TV EPG
and taps on a feed for Team A vs. Team B

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a blackout message

title: Deep Links
custom_preconds:
Given a user is logged in with a FYT account (following Team A)
and Team B is in-market
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to a MLB.TV Deep link for a game (Team A vs Team B)
and the game has a live MLB.TV feed

http://wapqa.mlb.com/test/android/atbat-links.html
custom_expected: Then the Team A feed should start
